test-case.name: Given the admin user is on the Tool Builder admin page
test-case.title: Given the admin user is on the Tool Builder admin page

test-case.name: And she selects "My New Tool Type" as default tool definition
test-case.title: And she selects "My New Tool Type" as default tool definition

test-case.name: And she goes to the Tool Instances Navigation Page
test-case.title: And she goes to the Tool Instances Navigation Page

test-case.name: And a tool instance called "My New Tool Def Instance" exists
test-case.title: And a tool instance called "My New Tool Def Instance" exists

test-case.name: When the user selects the tool instance "My New Tool Def Instance"
test-case.title: When the user selects the tool instance "My New Tool Def Instance"

test-case.name: And she deletes the current tool instance
test-case.title: And she deletes the current tool instance

test-case.name: And the admin user goes to the Tool Builder admin page
test-case.title: And the admin user goes to the Tool Builder admin page

test-case.name: And a tooltip message with text "unselect-or-delete-instances-to-configure-delete-tooldef" is shown for the buttons on tool definition "My New Tool Type"
test-case.title: And a tooltip message with text "unselect-or-delete-instances-to-configure-delete-tooldef" is shown for the buttons on tool definition "My New Tool Type"

test-case.name: And the user selects "Test Tool" as default tool definition
test-case.title: And the user selects "Test Tool" as default tool definition

test-case.name: And the button to delete the tool definition called "My New Tool Type" is enabled
test-case.title: And the button to delete the tool definition called "My New Tool Type" is enabled

test-case.name: And the button to configure the tool definition called "My New Tool Type" is enabled
test-case.title: And the button to configure the tool definition called "My New Tool Type" is enabled

test-case.name: And she selects to delete the tool definition called "My New Tool Type"
test-case.title: And she selects to delete the tool definition called "My New Tool Type"

test-case.name: Then a tool definition called "My New Tool Type" does not exist
test-case.title: Then a tool definition called "My New Tool Type" does not exist
